item.title: Data Science at Altitude
item.description: The website of Daniel Hadley, an R programmer based in Salt Lake City, UT. üèÇ Latest post

Biography I am the Chief Data Scientist at the Sorenson Impact Center, an applied academic institution that is part of the University of Utah‚Äôs Business School. My job is to help governments, non-profits, and philanthropists use data to better address difficult social problems. (DISCLAIMER: I don’t speak for the Center or any of its affiliates on this blog. These are my opinions.) Previously, I served as the Chief of Staff and Chief Data Scientist to Mayor Joe Curtatone of Somerville, Massachusetts, and as an Innovations in American Government Fellow at the Harvard Kennedy School.

item.title: Teaching
